description: This source file is an HTML document that serves as a frontend user interface for a Database Viewer application. It includes structure, styles, and embedded JavaScript for dynamically loading and displaying database information, tables, and data with interactive features.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases by reloading data and resetting UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database in the sidebar, loading its tables when expanded.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays the tables for a given database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table, rendering it as an interactive table with expandable cells.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for a data table from fetched data for display.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual table cells, handling nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Toggles expanded view of cell contents for full display.
